Certified maintenance services providers will willingly cooperate with Gaus, because we will be providing them with a customer base.

Author: Duangerd
Title: [ICO]ğŸ”¥[ANN]ğŸ’¥GTğŸ’¥ â€” GAUS TRADE ğŸš˜ CARS DIRECTLY FROM MANUFACTURER ğŸš˜
Body: Thank you for very vital and interesting question. let us briefly represent you our advantages and disatvantges of us and our competitors in the answer to your question.  Gaus trade is the conceptually new block-platform for the automotive market.  Description- Gaus trade is the platform that excludes intermediaries from the chain between the manufacturer and the end buyer. Consumers get new cars cheaper, and automakers get a convenient marketplace for conducting trade.  Advantages;  Wide functionality for the ""primary market"" cars. Deliberately worked out smart contract . A well-considered ICO procedure with a flexible bonus system. Realistic idea. The presence of additional functions (insurance, crediting).  Disadvantages;  No option to trade used cars.  Advantages of the competitors;  Used cars trade option.  Disadvantages of the competitors  Trade only used cars. The lack of information on the use of funds collected during the ICO. No additional services. Focus on large dealers.   A small number of ways to monetize.   The presence of additional functions (insurance, crediting). No additional services. Focus on large dealers.   A small number of ways to monetize.   It is not clear how the user's vehicle data will be verified. No additional services. Focus on large dealers.   No details about the technical platform.   It is not clear how the user's vehicle data will be verified. Lack of information about the sources of data collection. Suspiciously high hard cap. [/list]

Author: Duangerd
Title: [ICO]ğŸ”¥[ANN]ğŸ’¥GTğŸ’¥ â€” GAUS TRADE ğŸš˜ CARS DIRECTLY FROM MANUFACTURER ğŸš˜
Body: Thank you for the request! The starting regions of the GAUS system will be Europe and Asia with the support of regional KYC / AML procedures and customer service systems. Support centers will help expand the global presence of GAUS. The centers will be responsible for regional marketing, PR and management of the regional user base.

Author: Duangerd
Title: [ICO]ğŸ”¥[ANN]ğŸ’¥GTğŸ’¥ â€” GAUS TRADE ğŸš˜ CARS DIRECTLY FROM MANUFACTURER ğŸš˜
Body: Nice to meet you! The main idea of Gaus is the sale of new vehicles directly from the manufacturers without the participation of any dealers in the chain. Our business model does not imply the involvement of the secondary vehicle market. A couple of key advantages of our company: For customers: - Discount of up to 30% on new vehicles; - Ability to pay for vehicles in cryptocurrencies; - Freezing of funds until the moment of delivery and transfer of the vehicle (especially important when buying supercars from small manufacturers); - Reduction of delivery times. For manufacturers: - Growth of revenues thanks to the acceptance of cryptocurrencies as a means of payment; - Ready-made system for selling vehicles online; - Reduction of warehousing costs thanks to the per order operating principle; - Competitive advantage in the form of honest prices for vehicles when buying through the Gaus Trade platform.  Issues regarding the registration of vehicles: We will work with local customs brokers and logistics companies. Since Gaus is a marketplace, it will accumulate orders, and customs brokers will be interesting in working with us, because we will be attracting a significant number of customers. The necessary documents for the registration of vehicles will be applied upon delivery of vehicles from the manufacturers, including the sales contract document for Russian customers. This system has proven to be perfectly functional under the carsharing scheme. In the future, registration data will be recorded in the blockchain.

Author: Duangerd
Title: [ICO]ğŸ”¥[ANN]ğŸ’¥GTğŸ’¥ â€” GAUS TRADE ğŸš˜ CARS DIRECTLY FROM MANUFACTURER ğŸš˜
Body: Thank you for question, dear Elleronie! The process of transformation from GAUS Token to GAUS Coin is described below. Fell free to ask more questions if there are after you read the operation description.  â€¢ Upon registration in the system, the manufacturer is given a GAUS ID code, a so-called Manufacturing Tag intended to be used in the emission of this manufacturerâ€™s GAUS SMART COINS (GSC). â€¢ In order to pay for the GAUS smart contract, the buyer needs to hold GAUS tokens. The GAUS cryptocurrency can be purchased at an exchange or via the GAUS wallet (the member area) for any other popular cryptocurrency or fiat money. â€¢ The buyer chooses one of the standardized smart contracts available and pays for the purchased goods with the GAUS cryptocurrency, which is automatically converted into GSC tagged by the manufacturer that takes the order (GSC emission takes place the moment of smart contract settlement). â€¢ The manufacturer receives â€œfrozenâ€ GSC as payment. â€¢ The manufacturer can keep the GSC or use it as security to get the payment in fiat money from a GAUS partner bank. â€¢ Upon vehicle receipt, the buyer activates the GSC chain. The GSC is converted into untagged GAUS cryptocurrency and can be exchanged into other currencies, fiat or crypto

Worked in the field of information security in leading security companies such as Eracom Tech AG and SafeNet AG (currently Gemalto) for 7 years, including 5 years in Germany.  Paul started his journey to the world of blockchain in 2016 with mining, then he  worked in a crypto-investment fund, as well as with a number of ICO projects. Taking into consideration the fact that Paul has a huge in investment banking he is going to help us to work with investors,  in assistance with the preparation of financial and business models, and tokenomics modeling.
